name: Lorem_sentencesTest
description: Unit tests for the Lorem class's sentences method.

test_cases.name: testSentencesWithPositiveCount
test_cases.description: Tests the sentences method of the Lorem class with a positive count, ensuring the returned list has the correct size and each sentence ends with a period.

test_cases.name: testSentencesWithZeroCount
test_cases.description: Tests the sentences method of the Lorem class with a zero count, ensuring the returned list is empty.
